summary: Triggers when certain key is pressed or released

ports.name: key code
ports.text: In most cases you wonâ€™t have to use this directly, just use the `Learn` button. It contains the key code on which to respond. You can use [keycode.info](http://keycode.info/) to find out the key code you are looking for.

ports.name: canvas only
ports.text: If you want to only trigger when a key has been pressed while the canvas has the focus (when you clicked in the canvas before) use `true`. If you want key presses to trigger even if the canvas is not in focus set it to `false` (global mode).

ports.name: Prevent Default
ports.text: Prevent that other key listeners (parents) are informed on the key press

ports.name: learn
ports.text: Press learn and directly afterwards (3 Seconds) press a key, this one will from now on trigger on the output port `On Press` once the key has been pressed.

ports.name: on press
ports.text: Triggers every time the learned key is pressed down (and also triggers while it is hold down).

ports.name: on release
ports.text: Triggers every time the learned key is released (once).

ports.name: Pressed
ports.text: True if the key is currently pressed, false otherwise

changelog.message: added key-name to extended title and outport
